title: Most Commercial Bank Branches
description: San Marino has the highest number of commercial bank branches per 100,000 adults, with 122.01 branches as of 2023.

title: Highest Growth in Household Consumption Expenditure
description: In 2022, San Marino experienced a significant growth in household and NPISHs final consumption expenditure, with an annual growth rate of 15.56%.

title: Lowest Agriculture Contribution to GDP
description: Agriculture, forestry, and fishing contribute only 0.01% to San Marino's GDP, the lowest in the world as of 2022.

title: Lowest Pupil-Teacher Ratio in Secondary Education
description: San Marino boasts the lowest pupil-teacher ratio in secondary education, with only 5.84 students per teacher as of 2018.

title: Lowest Infant Mortality Rate
description: San Marino has one of the lowest infant mortality rates in the world, with only 1.4 deaths per 1,000 live births as of 2023.
